descriptions.name: Overview of Class
descriptions.value: Contact the department for further information

overview_of_class:
This course is designed for students who have experience with college-level writing but who want to sharpen their writing and communication skills. Students learn to apply measures of excellence in business writing and communication. Assignments relate to business environments, including audience analysis, persuasive writing, verbal and interpersonal communication, and document design and graphics. Writers gain experience writing in collaborative environments, producing multiple drafts and receive feedback from their peers and the instructor.

This hybrid course combines in-class lecture and discussion on campus with online sessions. In-class meeting dates are 9/22, 9/29, 10/13, 10/27, 11/17 and 12/1. Attendance is strongly encouraged for all sessions. Homework will be due in-class and online.
name: Intermediate Composition
title: SCS ENGLISH 205-CN-66 Intermediate Composition

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: ENGLISH 111 or equivalent. Carries business credit
